reviews.review:
I hate horror movies and I especially hate slasher flicks.  This game is basically a slasher flick.
I don't know why, but I love this game.  I love completing objectives in games and this has the objective of getting 5 generators fixed, open the exit, and escape with your life.  I love the cat and mouse aspect of this game.  I love hiding or running around corners, back tracking where I was and throwing the killer off my trail.
I love being the hunter and chasing after survivors and finding them when they think they're safe and hidden.
I like this game a ton.

85% fun and 15% pure bullshit. The Devs gotta change their priorities when it comes to patching, but overal a game that hopefully only gets better patch by patch.

If you like winning play killer. You will win and/or pip 98% of the time even if the survivors are a little higher rank.

If you want a challenge and lose pips over stupid reasons (like killers leaving the game/dc) then play survivor...

J'ai acheté avec beaucoup d'enthousiasme Dead by Daylight il y a quelques temps, mais MON DIEU que ce jeu est vide ! On en fait très vite le tour, on croirait à un early access... Le contenu du jeu est trop faible par rapport à ce qui était attendu à la base. Sans parler du matchmaking qui est aussi performant qu'un légume. Le jeu possède de nombreux bugs et les cheaters sont également encore trop présent. 

Dead by daylight à un gros potentiel mais le faible contenu qu'il propose et le matchmaking INFAME qui est proposé fait de ce jeu un mauvais jeu pour le moment...

Cette évaluation est à revoir par la suite, ce n'est que mon avis sur ce jeu pour l'instant. Reste à voir le travail des développeurs par la suite...

I've reviewed the game with a silly phrase and i'm editing the review cause i got the hours to back it up what I WANT TO SAY....
This game is fantastic(don't mind the silly rage quit kids),for 20 bucks you got a great game where you have the option to play both sides-survivor/killer....In 3rd vision/1st vision.....in 6 maps generated in 5 diferent ways(20 bucks)....You got 5 survivors and 4 Killers (another one is coming) with clothes to personalize.....(20 bucks)with 5 modes to play.....Kill your friends,Survive with friends,Survivor mode,Killer mode and quick mode.Generated skill tree where you can combine 4 diferent slots of Itens,Add-ons,Offering and Perks to create multiple play styles....(20 bucks).Really???What's the catch?

Well the catch is that the game suffers from constant pressure of silly kids who take things a little too serious while playing.....there's been bugs of rendering and some minor aspects of loading parts of maps,players get stuck under some rocks and and stuff and i dont get cause i never had any of this things in the amount of hours i had...they had over 30 bug fixes 3 days after release and people complained....They created survive with friends at people demands in 4 weeks and they complained,Infinite loop jukes got cried out they fixed a lot and people complained(20 fk bucks).
Well i know the game is not perfect,none really are,the matchmaking is annoying for people,from what i've heard(never waited more then 2 minutes for each game,Ever),the dc's and lack of punishment for both sides,the hilarious part of lack of content(20 fk bucks and peope still cry),the camping part of the killers,Key binding,what's the rest cause i don't remember......

Still better than the salt people are throwing at the game.....

THERE IS A HUGE GAME BREAKING BUG AT THE MOMENT.

In patch 1.0.4 the latest patch, there is a very annoying bug that is if you pick up a player when they are in dying state as the killer there a very big chance that you will get stuck.

When you pick up a survivor thats in dying state, then as soon as you have him/her in your hands you cant move or do anything. 

you cant walk, put the survivor down by pressing r, or attack or anything!

the survivor that you have on your back cannot wiggle or do anything ( i know this because i have tried it as being the survivor and being the killer.

and thats not all.

Everything else thats happening in the game isnt frozen
all the other survivors can still move and get generators and do whatever that pleases them.

And most of you are probably thinking "well can you stop the bug if you light the frozen killer with a flashlight"?
and the answer to that is no you cant. (i played killer and a non frozen survivor flashed me all over the body for severel seconds but nothing happend!

Please fix this bug its super annoying thank you!

(BUG HAS BEEN FIXED, SO YEAH! LOL!)

NOTE: Please understand that I wrote this review during it's early release stages, Updated it after the Halloween patch
I absolutely adore this game, everything about it brings back memories of playing Custom games like Mike Meyers.
That being said however this game is full to the brim with bugs, glitches and unfair balances to the player, most notably to the Survivors (there are some towards the killer but I feel as though he gets enough buff up as is) I should also note that I have personally played very few games as the killer, only due to me playing with friends.

A lot of the problems stem from the Peer to Peer connection, where as a survivor, you will be connected to someone seemingly acroos the seven continents (I've had the pleasure of being in a game with french, canadian and even Russian players) and will run off the Hosts (killer) connection. this would be fine and dandy that person is in the same region as you, however if you're a brit like me, and you connect to an American server, I think you can see the issue there. Laggy games, stuttering, messing up skill checks, not being able to successfuly escape from the killer all vital things required to, you know, Win? On top of this, it means you'll be waiting 10 minutes plus for a possible 30 seconds of gameplay.

Bugs and glitches abound as shown in other reviews, You can get stuck vaulting, which results in you dying, not being able to be picked up, other survivors not being able to revive you which, by the by, is the only way to actually recover from being downed with the bar only being a slight cock tease as to you reviving.

Unfair perks towards the killer, penalties given to the survivors if the KILLER leaves, and the Wraith is just utter easy mode for them, the ability to wander the entire map invisible is a complete cheese personal opinion on this is that the Wraith needs rescource management or to be allowed to only stay invisible for a certain amount of time, the slasher is fairly alright, maybe up the ability to escape traps easier and the Hillbilly is perfectly fine In my opinion

In conclusion, buy this game if you're going to have a group of friends to play it with, as I've had loads of fun in private games with 5 people. Don't buy this game if you plan to go in alone

Actually found game after playing a match of evolve and being super frustrated playing the monsters. Well this game is like evolve except not frustrating when you play the killer. It's actually kinda thereputic watching you victim get impaled on a meat hook and waiting for the dark lord (cthulhu perhaps?) come and claim your sacrifice. This game has amazing potential. From the proceduraly created maps to the different hunters I could see myself playing this for awhile, but only if the developers keep adding content like new killers/ survivors/ map types/ game modes. For 20 dollars I would say take a STAB at it. I have already got my 20 bucks worth and I am still pulling back the the skin of this dark little diamond in the rugh.
I prefer 'Lobby Simulator 1994 - Amazon jungle edition' less bugs.

Have you ever gotten so invested in a game that you come to the forums or review section to complain about things?  This game has done that to me and a lot of other people.

The game play is incredibly fun and despite it being a single game mode, the leveling and ranking system add a ton of replay ability. 

The recent addition of "Survive with Friends" has made an amazing game even more fun.

When both sides are complaining about balance, it's a good sign that things are going well.

The game as is, I would 100% recommend.  However, there are some things you should keep in mind...  While this is a released game, there are quite a few bugs and other small issues.  It feels more like an early access game.  But like an early access, the developers are involved and patching/balancing the game on a regular basis.  The developers even stream on twitch every week keeping people informed on what they are working on and changing. 

TL;DR  The game is good and worth it as is and it will only get better.

This games quality has fluctuated wildly over the (almost) 6 years it's existed... As a result it's caused me to make what is now 3rd change to my review of it. 

My previous review was to the effect of "It's flawed but the devs clearly seem to care as the issues eventually get fixed". I can no longer say this. The team that gave this game it's strong identity and allure at the start has clearly left or been reshuffled to an insane degree. BHVR have gone from wanting to tighten up their new game experiencing teething problems to a developer that only cares about how much time and money it can siphon from it's overly addicted & toxic player-base.

They flippantly dismiss all player concerns about the game. One example I shall never forget is Cotes unironically looking at the camera when talking about the release of the Resident Evil Chapter and saying "I still think we did a pretty good job so far"... Only for the RPD map, arguably the BIGGEST amount of content people PAID for to be buggy and disabled for A WHOLE MONTH after release. They still happily took players money for something they clearly put no quality control into... Cote's "PrEtTy GoOd JoB sO fAr" attitude followed immediately by the release of broken content is embarrassing, and no, more bloodpoints & Iri shards doesn't make selling a broken product any less reprihensable. 

The latest major update for the game is the final nail in the coffin for me. Survivor perks always make it through the PTB unaltered whereas new killer perks & base kits will almost always get a nerf shortly after the PTB, to the point where they no longer resemble the product they were happy to take your money for. 

For this game to get a "recommended" from me some MASSIVE changes would need to be made. But I don't believe the developers care enough to divert their attention away from churning out more paid cosmetics to fix it. In it's current state don't buy it. Take it from someone who avidly followed this game since it's release.

Довольно бодрый кооператив в котором можно ощутить себя маньячиной с тесаком, бензопилой, кувалдой и другими игрушками для наказания. Либо стать пушечным мясом - одним из выживших со своими особыми перками. 
Игра 17+ а значит никаких "плюшевых" гг: рубанул каого-то - остаётся кровь. Довольно атмосферные карты, особенно если ты выживший. Из плюсов так же цена игры, по сегодняшним меркам не большая (499 рублей на момент написания обзора) 
Из минусов:  "деревянная" анимация, повторяющиеся выжившие - очень не хвататет редактора гг, мало карт, встречаются различные баги но уже не так часто как раньше, ведь регулярно выходят различные патчи/фиксы. 
За маньяков играть сложнее, особенно первый раз, т.к их наградили излишней ненужной анимацией, которая их тормозит - я про вытирание крови и другие действия после нанесения удара. Зато выжившие умеют мгновенно снимать с крюков своих товарищей: при этом снятые бодро бегают как обычные раненые. 
Игра в чём-то уникальная - в плане задумки, надеюсь смогут реализовать весь потенциал за этот год не растеряв аудиторию....

Если у вас стальные нервы и вы думаете что вас не что не сможет довести до истерики, тогда поиграйте в Dead By Daylight. Dead By Daylight, только здесь вы найдете кучу багов, лагов, а также кучу вылетов из игры. Вы думаете у вас топовый комп и вам этого не грозит, вынужден вас огорчить, у ваших тимейтов или же врагов, может быть деревянный комп из-за которых вы будете вечно сбегать. Вы скажите сбегать это же круто, я с вами соглашусь, но экспу заработанную за эту катку вы не получите и ваш труд просто коту под хвост. Из 5-10 игр, вы отыграете полных 1-3. Цена этой игры потолок 100 рублей за кучу багов и лагов, да разработчики фиксят баги, но в игре их по-прежнему невыносимо много. Поэтому, если вы вдруг купили игру, то купите пачку успокоительных, а лучше две. И еще огромный минус игры в том, что игра не имеет регионов, а значит ты  находишься на Камчатке и можешь попасть в игру к примеру Московской области, где интернет в разы лучше, и твой пинг будет около 150+. Когда игру доведут до ума, она уже будет никому не нужна, по этому не советую!

Эта игра просто офигенна! Мне нравится в этой игре всё! От задумки до малейших деталей. Разработчики усердно стараются улучшить игру и это можно заметить на их стриме. С каждым патчем меньше багов, добавили русский язык(есть конечно косяки, например: "Найти выйти" или "Шопот"). Я снимаю перед разработчиками шляпу и желаю им успехов!

This game is buggy and has no dedicated servers. The gameplay is unbalanced completely. New players will NEVER survive and  pros have a hard time getting out alive. You need to be god level at jukes and abuse safe spots and overpowered perks to stand a chance at surviving. The killers job is way easy and a high level killer gets absurdly unfair perks. We are talking 1 hit kills you. Guy running around vision clear as counterstrike in broad daylight with a flashlight. no heartbeat to warn you. can move from generator to generator in 2 seconds or can instantly kill anyone they hook with unfair traps at your feet so no one can rescue you. Game takes way to long to get even a usuable perk and i should mention that you need to get it level 3 to actually have any statistical, meaningful impact on gameplay. Youll be getting banged hard for 100 hours just to get a mediocre tier 3 perk to mabye stand a 1% increase in surviving where the killer will be just OP from level 1 to infinity. Buy this game if you want a hard learning curve and a difficult challenge on survior. If you want the easiest game on the entire steam market buy this game and play killer.

The game has its moments where it REALLY sucks. (when killer leaves, infinites, high rank vs low rank) but this game is one of the best games i have ever played. and the devs do fix certain things like some infinites and added punisment for SURVIVORS that leave, not sure for the killer.Also adding new addons perks and clothing. but if your looking to buy this game in my opinion its definitly worth 20$. its an emotional rollercoaster from anger to joy its fun either way for me :).so ya its a fixer, but its getting fixed. so its worth it

Usually I need 2 hours to decide whether or not a game is good. This game however, was optimized and executed SO poorly that I cut that usual time down to a solid 98 mins before determining how foolish a purchase this game is. 

Survivors:
-No teamwork (nobody every sticks their neck out for anyone in this game #fuckbitchsfixgenerators 
- The SECOND you get knocked down/ hung teammates basically dgaf (based on 10 games as a survivor)
- NO communication whatsoever with teammates via text or mic so nobody knows wtf anybody is doing
-matchmaking is garbage, always paired with high level people with a bunch of perks and shit I never even got the opportunity to use just rushing the game on their own.
- If you escape and your downed you still die (WHAT?!)

OP hillbilly McDouchebag:
- Killers are usually played by filthy degenerate neckbeards,who likely have penises that look more like a bellybutton with testicles. The man who gives credence to the old adge of "its just cold outside", in response to why his penis would be smaller than a vienna sausage. They abuse obvious loopholes in the games mechanics, like camping generators/escapes to insure their victory. Even in the event you get lucky (unlike myself) and actually get a cool team willing to complete the game together ( as I can only assume it was intended to be played) this peace of shit will probably knock you down, hang you, and camp you till you die. Regardless of the fact that they have to wait like 40mins to get a team of survivors willing to play against them, this gamer is willing to go the extra mile . Afterall its not like he can power trip on people when hes working his usual 9-5 at the local gas station. They also don't get penalized for leaving mid game like survivors, which is perfect because its not like running away from them is the objective of the game or anything.

All in all the games got potential and could have been something worth talking about in the horror community, as there aren't nearly as many titles for this gaming category as I would like there to be. However obvious overpowered mechanics and a community that would make LOL players shit their britches, has decimated any real hopes of an amazing new horrer game I had when buying this game.

J'ai 4h de connection à ce jeu pour avoir fait 5 parties. On passe son temps à cliquer sur prêt et à voir qu'il ne trouve pas de serveur quand on est seulement que 2 joueurs. Je vous deconseille de l'acheter pour le moment en tout cas, Si vous le faites c'est à vos risques et périls.
